name: Basic Plan
services_included: Online consultation with a general practitioner (limited minutes)
Access to basic health information and resources
features: Limited access to health education materials

name: Standard Plan
services_included: Annual health check-up reminders and scheduling
features: Access to a broader range of health education materials

name: Premium Plan
services_included: Unlimited access to online consultations with specialists
Virtual second opinions for critical cases
features: Full access to premium health education materials
